judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Order affirmed on the opinion of Judge Waltee R. Sohn, reported in 8 D. & C. 2d 535.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Creasy, Appellant, v. Lawler.
Argued April 17, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold and Jones, JJ.
reargument refused July 26, 1957.
Edward P. Good, with him Thomas D. Caldwell, A. E. Eountz, William A. Meyer, Alexander TJnhomo, Eountz, Fry & Meyer and Caldwell, Fox.& Stoner, for appellants.
June 28, 1957:
Thomas D. McBride, Attorney General, with him Joseph L. Donnelly, Deputy Attorney General and Leonard M. Mendelson, for appellees.
